          <title>
            <string language="en">Endoscope</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Endoscope</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Endoscope</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Endoscope</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Endoscope</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ενδοσκόπιο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Endoscope</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows how a doctor can look inside a patient's stomach using an endoscope.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">glasses</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">optical fibres</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">stomach</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie ein Doktor innerhalb 
des Magens eines Patienten mit einem endoscope schauen kann.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre comment un docteur peut 
regarder à l'intérieur de l'estomac d'un patient en utilisant un 
endoscope.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra como um doutor pode olhar
dentro do estômago de um paciente usando um endoscope.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra come un medico può 
osservare all'interno dello stomaco del paziente usando un endoscope.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση επιδεικνύει πώς ένας γιατρός 
μπορεί να κοιτάξει μέσα στο στομάχι ενός ασθενή χρησιμοποιώντας
ένα ενδοσκόπιο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra cómo un doctor puede 
mirar dentro del estómago de un paciente usando un endoscope.</string>
          </description>
